content: If a group of stones, even though it is completely surrounded by opposing stones, has two separate spaces inside, or two eyes, where the opponent cannot play, it will not be captured â€“ it is considered a live group.
translations: ita:Se un gruppo di pietre, anche se completamente circondato da pietre avversarie, ha all'interno due spazi separati, o due
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
